title: Saltillo Rooftops (Mexico)
medium: watercolor, graphite and gouache on paper
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Edward Hopper [1882-1967], New York, NY and South Truro, MA; Frank K. M. Rehn, Inc., New York, NY, by 1947; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. [1898-1993] James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA, 1947 until February 8, 1960 [1]; their gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1960.

Notes:
[1]. The Beals purchased the painting from the Rehn Gallery in 1947 (see "The Beal Collection of American Art," Carnegie Museum of Art, 1994, p. 96.)

creator.birth_place: Nyack (Rockland county, New York state, United States)
